content: Technology has now come full circle to the point it’s harder than ever to find music. In middle school I bought albums and listened to the radio. Life was good. Then came napster and limewire, and life was better. Now I’m 30, and I don’t use a lot of this digital streaming available. I may sound old and dated especially posting on a blog site, but I miss just being able to buy a 12 dollar cd and put the crisp sounding muhfucka into my ride. Kind of scary that some songs are literally dissapearing
